titles.title: All The Way To Calvary (easy nice uptempo)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All the way to Calvary He went for me He went for me He went for me All the way to Calvary He went for me He died to set me free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh how dark the night that wrapt my spirit round Oh how deep the woe my Savior found When He walk'd across the waters of my soul Bade my night disperse and made me whole{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Trembling a sinner bow'd before His face Naught I knew of pardon God's free grace Heard a voice so melting "Cease thy wild regret Jesus bought thy pardon paid thy debt"{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O 'twas wondrous love the Savior show'd for me When He left His throne for Calvary When He bore my trespass bore it all alone Praise His Name forever make it known{/lang-eng}
